attributes.additional_details:
The Government should scrap the benefits cap during the pandemic.
I am a working parent and this month my furlough payment does not meet the benefit cap, so 
£1,049.62 was taken off my benefit this month, for the benefit cap.
attributes.background: The Government Furlough payment should meet the benefit cap. The benefits cap should be the same as the furlough payment of 80%

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about people's incomes, but we're not clear exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find advice about benefits here: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/benefits/coronavirus-check-what-benefits-you-can-get/

You might like to sign and share this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301437
